errors.error_description: Lists system dependencies that are not actually needed for an ontology project
correction_candidates: Remove the system dependencies entirely as ontology projects typically don't need build tools
Replace with git and curl as more relevant dependencies for cloning repositories
Change to python3-pip python3-venv as the only necessary system packages
Update to include only libxml2-utils and remove build-essential and python3-dev
errors.golden_answer: Remove the system dependencies entirely as ontology projects typically don't need build tools

errors.error_description: References requirements.txt file that doesn't exist in the repository
correction_candidates: Replace with specific package installation commands like pip install rdflib owlrl
Change to pip install . to install from the current directory setup
Use pip install --upgrade pip setuptools wheel instead
Replace with pip install -e . for editable development installation
errors.golden_answer: Replace with specific package installation commands like pip install rdflib owlrl
